channel.title: Comments on: Mallows and Milan Cookies – Daring Bakers July 2009

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Everyone
You've all been very supportive of the Daring Bakers Challenge! Thank you so much! I really enjoyed the challenges and loved the result. I enjoy reading all your lovely comments immensely!!
Thanks Again and I look forward to next month's challenge! Anita
item.content:encoded:
Hi Everyone

You’ve all been very supportive of the Daring Bakers Challenge! Thank you so much! I really enjoyed the challenges and loved the result. I enjoy reading all your lovely comments immensely!!

Thanks Again and I look forward to next month’s challenge!
Anita

item.title: By: Elissa
item.dc:creator: Elissa
item.description: Your artistic interpretation is really quite nice! I'm starting to wish I'd made the mallows, too - yours look perfect.
item.content:encoded: Your artistic interpretation is really quite nice! I’m starting to wish I’d made the mallows, too – yours look perfect.

item.title: By: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.dc:creator: Julia @ MÃ©langer
item.description: Anita, you've done such a lovely job of your cookies. Amazing!
item.content:encoded: Anita, you’ve done such a lovely job of your cookies. Amazing!

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: wow you did an amazing job! they look gorgeous! Good job :)
item.content:encoded: wow you did an amazing job! they look gorgeous! Good job ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: John (Eat4Fun)
item.dc:creator: John (Eat4Fun)
item.description: Wonderful results! The deconstructed Mallow looks very fun! Great Job!
item.content:encoded: Wonderful results! The deconstructed Mallow looks very fun! Great Job!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Very impressive cookies! I especially love the beautiful marshmallow!
item.content:encoded: Very impressive cookies! I especially love the beautiful marshmallow!

item.title: By: Y
item.dc:creator: Y
item.description: Love both your mallows and the milan cookies! I'm not a huge fan of marshmallow cookies, but it was so much fun making and dipping them :)
item.content:encoded: Love both your mallows and the milan cookies! I’m not a huge fan of marshmallow cookies, but it was so much fun making and dipping them ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Lauren
item.dc:creator: Lauren
item.description: Yum!! All of your cookies look amazing - I especially love the artistic version of the mallows =D.
item.content:encoded: Yum!! All of your cookies look amazing – I especially love the artistic version of the mallows =D.

item.title: By: Sophia
item.dc:creator: Sophia
item.description: Holy crap you are an amazing baker! What gorgeous little pillowy chocolatey goodness! They look absolutely perfect!! I wish I had the patience and skills you have!
item.content:encoded: Holy crap you are an amazing baker! What gorgeous little pillowy chocolatey goodness! They look absolutely perfect!! I wish I had the patience and skills you have!
